Name: Passion Fruit Margarita
Instructions: Cut passion fruit in half and scoop out the flesh from one half into your shaker (retain the other half for garnish). Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice, and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Subtle passion fruit flavour and tartness influence rather than dominate this Margarita , allowing the tequila and other ingredients to also shine. Fruity yet sophisticated.
Garnish: Lime juice and salt rim if desired. Float half passion fruit
